sentences.sContent: Since namely namely misconceive, that explanation clear nice.
sentences.sContent_eng: Since namely namely misconceive, that explanation clear nice.
sentences.sCn: 既然是个误会，那解释清楚就好了。

sentences.sContent: Because some designers misconceive Chinese characters, therefore we should use it sensitively and rationally to give the design more persuasion and inspiration.
sentences.sContent_eng: Because some designers misconceive Chinese characters, therefore we should use it sensitively and rationally to give the design more persuasion and inspiration.
sentences.sCn: 但是设计师在利用汉字时，又存在着种种误区。因此，必须对汉字有足够的感性和理性认识，才能使设计作品更具说服力、感染力。

trans.tranOther: to have the wrong idea; fail to understand
